page.title: 16THE COMMUNITY CENTRE.
page.content: Burnfoot Community Centre is open every morning, afternoon and evening except Saturday morning and Sunday afternoo0n. It provides a range of activities for all ages, ranging from a creche for under 5's to gardening and friendship clubs for the over 5O's. For children aged 6 - l2 there are Brownies, Cubs, Boys Brigade, Youth Club, Sunday School and Discos. For l3 and over there are clubs for football, badminton, judo, weight-lifting, netball and computer classes as well as a Youth Club and Discos. In a survey it was found that more than half attend one or more groups in the Centre. When asked what they would like to see started, suggestions covered ballet and highland dancing, karate, snooker, gymnastics, flower arranging, knitting and a camera club.
